alert.note: Alert for St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 9:43PM CST until January 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Lingering flooding caused by earlier significant excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Louisiana, including the following parish, St. Tammany. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 943 PM CST, Residual flooding across the area continues. Between 4.5 and 6.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Covington, Abita Springs, Madisonville and Lacombe. - This includes the follwing Interstate... Interstate 12 between mile markers 58 and 71. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
